Articles.Content: Is there a way to actually brake?  In KSP1, I could either hit the B button, or click the Brakes action group button up by the altimeter.  I can't seem to find an appropriate or equivalent action in KSP2?

Maybe KSP2 doesn't auto-assign brakes to the action group like KSP1 did, and you need to do that yourself...?

Just guessing though, I have no idea.
Stop sign icon in the default action group box. It should work, same as B.
